source_sentence: 釋迦牟尼如來脚跡寫真一鋪(八月二十五日)已上觀座主捨與永充供養(大中八年八月二十五日)。
translation: Śākyamuni Tathāgata's footprints are copied on a truly one padded mat (on the twenty-fifth day of the eighth month) and presented to Yongchong as an offering by the master of the superior monastery (on the twenty-fifth day of the eighth month in the Mahāprajñāpāramitā).
